data.text: @kate_wall98 Thank you, physically we’re not too bad, our workout was low key and mainly aimed at getting my wee boy off his switch 😩 but the brain fog is quite something isn’t it? 🙈
@SFaulknerPandO Hope you all recover quickly x
@NovaScottSQH Oh no, I’m so sorry to hear that. Do you have a pulse oximeter at home to keep an eye on her oxygen levels? I really hope she’s feeling much better very soon x

@NovaScottSQH We’re doing ok, up and down. Andrew and I have both had a sore throat, runny nose etc. My husband tested negative today on lateral flow but got a positive PCR (he had a sore throat, so got a PCR yesterday). I hope Beth’s feeling ok and that you & your hubby avoid it!
@SFaulknerPandO Feel better soon. One down in the Manse (Beth). The Revd is fine; I feel rotten but testing negative. Urgh. So over it. Take care all xx
@ZalkaB To be fair it was a very scaled back workout, no where near the intensity I would usually do! It was just good to move a bit. Fingers crossed you’re all back to full fitness soon!
@SFaulknerPandO Team Faulkner, hang in there. Hope you feel better soon (we're still not back to 💯 yet). And way to go for this impromptu workout 👏👏💪💪
Update we’re now getting a Jamaican version of Postman Pat  ✉️ 📬 🤣. Andrew’s response was, he’s actually quite good 🤣! https://t.co/LAcllXLfBA
